H0.text: what capital city of brazil. Rio de Janeiro

H1.text: what capital city of brazil. São Paulo

H2.text: what capital city of brazil. Salvador

H3.text: what capital city of brazil. Brasília

A4.text: Brasília is the capital city of Brazil and the Federal District.

A5.text: It was founded by President Juscelino Kubitschek on 21 April 1960, to replace Rio de Janeiro as the national capital.
